https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/snwEsep12ZcaykPtboMsOie8bY.jpg Sai, a young artist living in a downtown warehouse delves into an ancient world of blood and lust. An enigmatic foreigner seduces her to try a long forgotten drug making her the prey of a dimensional vampire who needs her new found hunger for blood to cross over from his world to hers. Bled
